title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Effective Information Integration Process Based on Spatial and Temporal Continuity

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design visual elements by integrating complex scientific information according to the principle of spatial continuity.
Learners can apply a step-by-step information exposure strategy to minimize temporal dispersion elements.
Learners can diagnose their ability to design information integration and derive improvement points through formative assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
